attributes.action: Stop fining parents who take their children on holiday in term time
attributes.additional_details: At the monent schools give children chances to be able to go on residential holiday/break while in term time these trips are priced extremly high and could actually pay for a family holiday. Not all families can afford these break infact a very small amount of people can actually afford these trip.
attributes.background: Alow 10 days per year for parents to take children on holidays which will provide them extra education. It will help more families have the chance to have holidays and learn life lesson expand cluture and lots more.

rejection.details:
